content.text: I found BasicSection has margin left and right, try to find out which compoent affect margin width(i thinck section wrapper problem, maybe) than remove margin left and right so every section filled whole page width (but they has minmal padding left and right) so backgound color filled the whole page section range. and alpahfrom zero aniamtion still not work again. check animation registry and provider than check if they send animation property data correctly

payload.message: I found BasicSection has margin left and right, try to find out which compoent affect margin width(i thinck section wrapper problem, maybe) than remove margin left and right so every section filled whole page width (but they has minmal padding left and right) so backgound color filled the whole page section range. and alpahfrom zero aniamtion still not work again. check animation registry and provider than check if they send animation property data correctly

payload.name: update_plan
payload.arguments: {"plan":[{"status":"in_progress","step":"Inspect BasicSection and related wrappers to identify margins affecting horizontal width."},{"status":"pending","step":"Adjust styles so sections span full width with minimal horizontal padding while keeping background full bleed."},{"status":"pending","step":"Debug alpha-from-zero animation pipeline (registry/provider/prop flow) to ensure animation data passes and runs."}]}

payload.text: **Checking for global styles in app directory**

summary.text: **Checking for global styles in app directory**

payload.text:
**Analyzing section width and padding issues**

I'm investigating why BasicSection appears to have left and right margins despite using Tailwind’s container padding utilities. I’m checking if max-width constraints, default margins, or flexbox layouts in parent components might be limiting content width or causing visible white space, focusing on ensuring the background color extends full width with minimal horizontal padding.

summary.text:
**Analyzing section width and padding issues**

I'm investigating why BasicSection appears to have left and right margins despite using Tailwind’s container padding utilities. I’m checking if max-width constraints, default margins, or flexbox layouts in parent components might be limiting content width or causing visible white space, focusing on ensuring the background color extends full width with minimal horizontal padding.

payload.name: update_plan
payload.arguments: {"plan":[{"status":"completed","step":"Inspect BasicSection and related wrappers to identify margins affecting horizontal width. Located container-based margins in app/layout.tsx rather than BasicSection."},{"status":"in_progress","step":"Adjust styles so sections span full width with minimal horizontal padding while keeping background full bleed."},{"status":"pending","step":"Debug alpha-from-zero animation pipeline (registry/provider/prop flow) to ensure animation data passes and runs."}]}
